lines.text: ...Well, what if he was standing still on purpose?
What? Why would he stay stock still on purpose? He was on fire!
''Fire'' is exactly the word I'm thinking of!
That is, he wanted to ''fire'' his gun, and make sure to hit the Go Wizard directly in the heart.
So he took his time, used the cover of the fire to line up the shot, and...
Of course I have! You're not a wizard until you've had a spell or two blow up in your face!
...Not the answer I was expectin', but...
Y'know how when you're on fire, it's hard to concentrate on stuff that ain't ''not bein' on fire''?
So I'm not thinkin' Slick would've stayed in the fire so his aim would be better, so much.
